concept.title: Find employee
concept.shortdesc: How to find an employee with a multiple deduction from PFRON

conbody.p: As all formalities regarding employment of people with disabilities can be dealt with by e-mail thus the company can invite people from all over Poland. The process of recruitment and employment can be done remotely as it is done by companies specialising in employing people with disabilities. The first step in recruitment process should be using the company's database of employees.

If the company wants to employ persons remotely they can promote their job advertisements online on portals like (website in Polsih) or . Employers can use existing databases of persons with disabilities ()where they can register and complete their profile with skills, education, work preferences.
If the company requires a stationary worker they can to a Labour Office and present their job offer.
